page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: Our survey area displays constrasting styles of housing. The oldest part, Castletown, still retains its village-like appearance with many pre-war flats, colliery-terraced houses and semi-bungalows. The remainder of the survey area was built in post-war years. Hylton Castle Estate has predominantly two and three bedroomed semi-detached houses in small groups often around a cul-de-sac and usually within easy reach of a play area. Downhill estate has many blocks of flats termed 'S-blocks'. These are three storey blocks of twelve built eighteen years ago for young families. Residents have complained about dampness and been re-housed with the results that they have become neglected and vandalised.
